channel.title: NYS:EPD on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in NYS:EPD on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Enterprise Sees Resilience in Permian Despite Weak Oil Prices
item.description: Enterprise Products Partners LP, one of the largest pipeline operators in the Permian Basin, sees oil production in the region holding up this year despite an expected drop in crude prices.
